org.apache.tamaya.core.internal

Class DefaultConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.core.internal.DefaultConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configuration

    public class DefaultConfiguration
extends Object
implements Configuration
    Implementation of the Configuration API. This class uses the current ConfigurationContext to evaluate the chain of PropertySource and PropertyFilter instance to evaluate the current Configuration.

      • get

        public <T> T get(String key,
                 Class<T> type)
        Accesses the current String value for the given key and tries to convert it using the PropertyConverter instances provided by the current ConfigurationContext.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Configuration
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        key - the property's absolute, or relative path, e.g. @code a/b/c/d.myProperty}, never null.
        type - The target type required, not null.
        Returns:
        the converted value, never null.
